name: Meguri Aishite
overview: Meguri Aishite is a classic dating simulation game in which the player takes the role of a young student that returns to his old town to spend since the second year in high school (beginning in november) until the end of the third year of the high school with his graduation. During that time he will have to make a better relation with different girls of his school, there will be a lot of different conversations that will make them to appreciate him more or less, and the game features also different events to make things more interesting. The player can choose (as in many other dating simulation games) what his character is going to do during the week (study, work, gymnastic, etc) and that will increase or decrease his stats, those changes will make the weekends (the time when she can date the girls) to make things a lot different since his changes will make the converstions to go a way or another. There are also different places in the town to go (or date the girls there), or even other towns to travel in a date and see different things there. The game features 9 different main girls to date and different game endings depending of the player choices during the game.
